Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

package io.github.moctave.weftspace
  • Class
    Description
    Builder
    A class of utility methods designed to allow easy conversion from nodes to objects.
    Builder.DoubleType
    An enum storing a list of potential double types, for use in Builder.buildDouble(DataNode, int, String, DoubleType).
    Builder.IntType
    An enum storing a list of potential integer types, for use in Builder.buildInt(DataNode, int, String, IntType).
    DataNode
    A class representing a node in the data tree.
    DataNode.Flag
    The flag attached to this node, influencing how it should be treated during instantiation.
    DataReader
    A class which reads data from a file and stores it in a node tree.
    DataReader.Option
    Special flags that can be used when parsing
    DataWriter
    A class which writes data from a node into a file.
    LoadedNode
    A subclass of a node that is attached to a specific line and file, for use in debugging.
    Logger
    A class which handles error logging for this library.
    Logger.DynamicMessage
    A class that automatically fills in data based on the classes of its arguments.
    Logger.Message
    A class serving as a template for messages that can be logged.
    Logger.Severity
    An enum storing different levels of severity that a message can have.
